snippet: With details scarce, the investigation seems to cast doubt on the officer’s account of being attacked at home by an intruder.
abstract: New York Police Department opens an internal affairs investigation into Police Officer Rishi Gobin, who reported that he had been stabbed by an intruder in his Jamaica, Queens, home; move seems to cast doubt on the officer's story.

byline.original: By SARAH MASLIN NIR and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: With details scarce, the investigation seems to cast doubt on the officer’s account of being attacked at home by an intruder.

headline.seo: Internal Affairs to Investigate Stabbing of Off-Duty Officer
headline.main: Internal Affairs to Investigate Officer’s Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Internal Affairs to Investigate Officer’s Stabbing
